commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas8fc221c"

diff:
"8fc221c adding a class for themes to use.  (keeping trunk in sync with branch) r=mconnor (as part of bug #349286)
